boardgame.description: Progress! That's what these Dark Ages need, someone with a little get-up-and-go. You've been a serf in this one-pig town long enough, and it's time to shake things up. You've opened a guildhall for like-minded professionals from all over Europe to work together, build their trades, and get some economic stability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Now if only everybody else didn't have the same idea..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Well, you'll just have to do it faster than those other guys! Gather professionals into chapters, and use their combined might to reach for victory. Collect complete color sets of professions (all five colors of Trader, for instance), which you use to buy victory points (VP). The first player to gain 20 VP on her turn wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Guildhall, each profession grants you special abilities, and these abilities grow stronger the more of the set that you complete. When you cash in the set for victory points, however, you lose the ability until you can build it up again. Which professions are worth risking VP to keep?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5601) There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s No _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Feudal System._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Wealth concentrated in the top 1%? Check. Job security? Questionable. Health insurance? Nonexistent. Yep, sounds like the Middle Ages. And it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time you did something about that. Plenty of people around with perfectly good skills, all they need is somebody with the vision to put them together. Somebody like, say, you. Guildhall is a game of set collection where each card has an ability based on the number of similar cards you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve already gathered into your hall. More Traders? More trading power! Gather professionals of all five colors into your guildhall, and turn them into victory points. But you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not the only recruiter in the county, so get it done before someone makes your people a better offer!

I accept Paypal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Goods Purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; payments, but your grand total will suffice to make me _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;whole_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; after Paypal takes their fees out, which are $0.30 + 2.9% of the transferred amount. So around $1.25 extra here. *** OR THERE_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S THIS... *** I also accept ZERO-FEE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; PAYPAL payments that use a bank account or your existing Paypal balance as the payment source (NOT a credit card, unless you pick the option to pay the fees yourselves) for the exact sale price plus exact postage. To make a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Paypal payment, you: Log in to your Paypal account, click _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send Money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, then choose the option of send money to friends and family, NOT to purchase goods. Make sure your source of funds is either your bank account or your paypal account balance. (If you use a credit card, you must select the option to pay the fees.)

NOTE: This is a copy of the Guildhall: Seven Seas re-theme (in English, not Italian) from the AEG Black Box. This is the exact same game as Guildhall but with an awesome pirate theme and really nice updated art. The game is in like new condition with the cards having been removed from shrink but never shuffled. The cardboard coins are unpunched and instructions are present and in like new condition as well. Since it is from the AEG Black Box, there is no box for the game, but it can easily fit in with another game in your collection (like Machi Koro, for example). Shipping will be $6.00 via USPS small flat rate box. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you for looking!

Notes - Base game plus Job Faire Expansion. Version - AEG Condition - Base game cards sleeved and played a few times, expansion cards in shrink wrap. In excellent condition with very little box wear. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered two medium size games. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
Punched and played only one time, so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in excellent condition. Add $13.00 for shipping via USPS.
